title: Trippel
description: I was, together with two friends, hired as consultants to develop a recruitment tool for our study programme. The project included everything from gathering projects to design the interface and implement it in code.

title: Polygon
description: An interactive music video or experience in space with the goal to create a delightful feeling. The application is web based and built in webGL and with three.js.

title: Labyrint
description: I was, together with two friends, hired as consultants to develop a recruitment tool for our study programme. The project included everything from gathering projects to design the interface and implement it in code.

title: Kuling
description: Kuling is a weather application with multiple data sources. It was built in Angular-Dart and was the foundation of our bachelor thesis that e.g. discussed the ability to combine Dart with JavaScript and how agile principles influence the development of the application.

title: Play-by-ear
description: A music quiz game using Spotify's Android SDK develpoed for Android.
